title: Installation issue: netlib-scalapack and trilinos
body:
<!-- Thanks for taking the time to report this build failure. To proceed with the report please:

1. Title the issue "Installation issue: <name-of-the-package>".
2. Provide the information required below.

We encourage you to try, as much as possible, to reduce your problem to the minimal example that still reproduces the issue. That would help us a lot in fixing it quickly and effectively! -->

Hi,

I'm really new in Spack and I'm trying to install Trilinos on my macOS machine (Catalina 10.15.6) without success. The installation fails when netlib-scalapack has to be installed. 

Do you have any suggestion?

Thank you in advance for all your help,
Gabriele

### Steps to reproduce the issue

<!-- Fill in the exact spec you are trying to build and the relevant part of the error message -->
```console
$ spack install trilinos
==> Warning: apple-clang@11.0.0 cannot build optimized binaries for "skylake". Using best target possible: "x86_64"
==> 65338: Installing netlib-scalapack
==> Finding buildcaches at https://spack-llnl-mirror.s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/build_cache
==> Fetching https://spack-llnl-mirror.s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/build_cache/darwin-catalina-x86_64-apple-clang-11.0.0-netlib-scalapack-2.1.0-piujjxghd4rx4a6dgp3ukjgngsvodsjk.spec.yaml
curl: (22) The requested URL returned error: 404 Not Found                                                                                                       

==> Failed to fetch file from URL: https://spack-llnl-mirror.s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/build_cache/darwin-catalina-x86_64-apple-clang-11.0.0-netlib-scalapack-2.1.0-piujjxghd4rx4a6dgp3ukjgngsvodsjk.spec.yaml
    URL https://spack-llnl-mirror.s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/build_cache/darwin-catalina-x86_64-apple-clang-11.0.0-netlib-scalapack-2.1.0-piujjxghd4rx4a6dgp3ukjgngsvodsjk.spec.yaml was not found!
==> Fetching from https://spack-llnl-mirror.s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/build_cache/darwin-catalina-x86_64-apple-clang-11.0.0-netlib-scalapack-2.1.0-piujjxghd4rx4a6dgp3ukjgngsvodsjk.spec.yaml failed.
==> Warning: microarchitecture specific optimizations are not supported yet on mixed compiler toolchains [check apple-clang@11.0.0 for further details]
==> Using cached archive: /Users/gabriele/spack/var/spack/cache/_source-cache/archive/61/61d9216cf81d246944720cfce96255878a3f85dec13b9351f1fa0fd6768220a6.tgz
==> Staging archive: /var/folders/jm/m6sb9njx0sv5mv51f9d7pkyc0000gn/T/gabriele/spack-stage/spack-stage-netlib-scalapack-2.1.0-piujjxghd4rx4a6dgp3ukjgngsvodsjk/scalapack-2.1.0.tgz
==> Created stage in /var/folders/jm/m6sb9njx0sv5mv51f9d7pkyc0000gn/T/gabriele/spack-stage/spack-stage-netlib-scalapack-2.1.0-piujjxghd4rx4a6dgp3ukjgngsvodsjk
==> Applied patch /Users/gabriele/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/netlib-scalapack/int_overflow.patch
==> 65338: netlib-scalapack: Building netlib-scalapack [CMakePackage]
==> 65338: netlib-scalapack: Executing phase: 'cmake'
==> 65338: netlib-scalapack: Executing phase: 'build'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j16'

4 errors found in build log:
     2848    
     2849      775 |             CALL IGEBR2D( ONEDCONTEXT, 'ALL', ' ', 1, 1, TORECV, 1, 0,
     2850          |                                                         2
     2851    ......
     2852      778 |                CALL IGEBR2D( ONEDCONTEXT, 'ALL', ' ', TORECV, 1, IWORK,
     2853          |                                                                 1
  >> 2854    Error: Rank mismatch between actual argument at (1) and actual argument at (2) (scalar and rank-1)
  >> 2855    make[2]: *** [CMakeFiles/scalapack.dir/SRC/psstebz.f.o] Error 1
     2856    make[2]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
     2857    2 warnings generated.
     2858    [ 33%] Building Fortran object CMakeFiles/scalapack.dir/SRC/sstein2.f.o
     2859    /Users/gabriele/spack/opt/spack/darwin-catalina-x86_64/apple-clang-11.0.0/openmpi-3.1.6-rq44ux2m5xsdn3yq5abjprx5yxteuzk6/bin/mpif90 -DAdd_ -Dscalapa
             ck_EXPORTS -I/Users/gabriele/spack/opt/spack/darwin-catalina-x86_64/apple-clang-11.0.0/openmpi-3.1.6-rq44ux2m5xsdn3yq5abjprx5yxteuzk6/include  -O2 -
             g -DNDEBUG -isysroot /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX10.15.sdk -fPIC   -c /var/folders/jm/m6sb9njx0sv5mv51f9d7pkyc0000gn/T/gabriele/s
             pack-stage/spack-stage-netlib-scalapack-2.1.0-piujjxghd4rx4a6dgp3ukjgngsvodsjk/spack-src/SRC/sstein2.f -o CMakeFiles/scalapack.dir/SRC/sstein2.f.o
  >> 2860    make[1]: *** [CMakeFiles/scalapack.dir/all] Error 2
  >> 2861    make: *** [all] Error 2

See build log for details:
  /var/folders/jm/m6sb9njx0sv5mv51f9d7pkyc0000gn/T/gabriele/spack-stage/spack-stage-netlib-scalapack-2.1.0-piujjxghd4rx4a6dgp3ukjgngsvodsjk/spack-build-out.txt

==> Error: Failed to install netlib-scalapack due to ChildError: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j16'
4 errors found in build log:
     2848    
     2849      775 |             CALL IGEBR2D( ONEDCONTEXT, 'ALL', ' ', 1, 1, TORECV, 1, 0,
     2850          |                                                         2
     2851    ......
     2852      778 |                CALL IGEBR2D( ONEDCONTEXT, 'ALL', ' ', TORECV, 1, IWORK,
     2853          |                                                                 1
  >> 2854    Error: Rank mismatch between actual argument at (1) and actual argument at (2) (scalar and rank-1)
  >> 2855    make[2]: *** [CMakeFiles/scalapack.dir/SRC/psstebz.f.o] Error 1
     2856    make[2]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
     2857    2 warnings generated.
     2858    [ 33%] Building Fortran object CMakeFiles/scalapack.dir/SRC/sstein2.f.o
     2859    /Users/gabriele/spack/opt/spack/darwin-catalina-x86_64/apple-clang-11.0.0/openmpi-3.1.6-rq44ux2m5xsdn3yq5abjprx5yxteuzk6/bin/mpif90 -DAdd_ -Dscalapa
             ck_EXPORTS -I/Users/gabriele/spack/opt/spack/darwin-catalina-x86_64/apple-clang-11.0.0/openmpi-3.1.6-rq44ux2m5xsdn3yq5abjprx5yxteuzk6/include  -O2 -
             g -DNDEBUG -isysroot /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX10.15.sdk -fPIC   -c /var/folders/jm/m6sb9njx0sv5mv51f9d7pkyc0000gn/T/gabriele/s
             pack-stage/spack-stage-netlib-scalapack-2.1.0-piujjxghd4rx4a6dgp3ukjgngsvodsjk/spack-src/SRC/sstein2.f -o CMakeFiles/scalapack.dir/SRC/sstein2.f.o
  >> 2860    make[1]: *** [CMakeFiles/scalapack.dir/all] Error 2
  >> 2861    make: *** [all] Error 2

See build log for details:
  /var/folders/jm/m6sb9njx0sv5mv51f9d7pkyc0000gn/T/gabriele/spack-stage/spack-stage-netlib-scalapack-2.1.0-piujjxghd4rx4a6dgp3ukjgngsvodsjk/spack-build-out.txt
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/Users/gabriele/spack/lib/spack/spack/build_environment.py", line 846, in child_process
    return_value = function()
  File "/Users/gabriele/spack/lib/spack/spack/installer.py", line 1145, in build_process
    phase(pkg.spec, pkg.prefix)
  File "/Users/gabriele/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py", line 109, in phase_wrapper
    phase(spec, prefix)
  File "/Users/gabriele/spack/lib/spack/spack/build_systems/cmake.py", line 344, in build
    inspect.getmodule(self).make(*self.build_targets)
  File "/Users/gabriele/spack/lib/spack/spack/build_environment.py", line 133, in __call__
    return super(MakeExecutable, self).__call__(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/Users/gabriele/spack/lib/spack/spack/util/executable.py", line 189, in __call__
    proc.returncode, long_msg)
spack.util.executable.ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j16'

==> Warning: Skipping build of trilinos since netlib-scalapack failed
==> Warning: Skipping build of mumps since netlib-scalapack failed

```

### Information on your system

<!-- Please include the output of `spack debug report` -->

* **Spack:** 0.15.1
* **Python:** 3.7.4
* **Platform:** darwin-catalina-skylake

<!-- If you have any relevant configuration detail (custom `packages.yaml` or `modules.yaml`, etc.) you can add that here as well. -->

### Additional information

<!-- Please upload the following files. They should be present in the stage directory of the failing build. Also upload any config.log or similar file if one exists. -->
* [spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4982267/spack-build-out.txt)

* [spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4982270/spack-build-env.txt)


<!-- Some packages have maintainers who have volunteered to debug build failures. Run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mention them here if they exist. -->

### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [ ] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [x] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
